writer.name: 阿德里安·麦金蒂 Adrian McKinty

introduction: The Chain is a conspiracy thriller page-turner about an ordinary mother facing every parent’s worst nightmare: Her child is taken on her way to school. To get her back, the people behind the kidnapping plot – they call themselves The Chain – demand she do the unimaginable in exchange. A wicked, delirious puzzle piece that places audiences in the protagonist’s heart-pounding dilemma, The Chain is an exploration of a classic question with some very novel answers: Must the sins of the past plague the present?
